attributes.review: So I downloaded this app so I could support the “wonderful” president but first off its asking for TOO much info like why do you need my zip code then also it took FOREVER to download and also it took too much storage on my phone. I honestly don’t know where to begin with how bad this app is. I would not download it. Also after a week of using it I started to hear voices telling me racist things. I then proceeded to yell “BLACK LIVES MATTER” but they don’t stop. So now I’m here deleting the app. Hope you don’t have the same experience as me. (Gen Z don’t go down without a fight😊)
attributes.title: Ahh

attributes.review: so if you are living under a rock lemme say this, trump wants to ban tiktok, tiktok is my LIFE, i have also earned a decent following (follow me @gracynxdrawss) i ain’t even kidding when i say that i will cry for like a week straight, not to mention my only friends are gonna be outta town for like 3 weeks, no friends + no tiktok = death. i spend at least 5 hours a day on tiktok, what am i supposed to do? and i’ve never been a fan of trump, i’m young so i still have a lot to learn don’t get me wrong, but i just don’t really like him, but this whole tiktok situation makes me want to tear off all of his limbs and throw them into a volcano, one by one. gen z is furious, we will do anything to get our way, this is step one, we all are going to rate this app one star, enough people do it, the app will be deleted, and we won’t stop until we know that our app is safe! but in all seriousness i downloaded this app and it took literally hours to download, i opened the app to see an ✨ORANGE OOMPA LOOMPA✨ i didn’t go any further because i don’t want to make an account for such a stupid app.
attributes.title: gen z will rise

attributes.review: this app is so scary. I couldn’t help but look at the orange on my screen and think wow well he rape me next? 1/5 because i don’t want to be daddy trumps sex dolly 🥺
attributes.title: scary!!

attributes.review: i opened the app and immediately saw that orange cheetos penis and i made my sister download it and then donald trump dm’d her asking to analy rape her.

He is scared of a bunch of kids so he is shutting down an app that allows kids to express themselves. What happened to freedom of speech, is that thrown out the window because gen z kids messed with your rally. So pathetic! also this app 🤮

attributes.review: I rate this app a 1 out of 5 starts, because all I see is stupidity & bias. There is nothing presidential about this app, Trump you sound like a teen girl trying to run for hoco queen. This app just shows how immature and incapable of doing your job, you really are. All I see is an app presenting a racist/rapist/sexist “president” and I along with thousands of other persons really am just not for it. The lack of knowledge and professionalism is ✨astronomical✨ it is wayyyy to high. So i’d like to leave you with one final thought, get your orange butt out of office and stop using the slogan: “Make America Great Again”  and look outside your privileged little bubble. You’ll see the distraction you refuse to see or pretend not to. Thanks luv💕
attributes.title: Out of the app store & out of office💕

attributes.review: I opened the app and president trump facetimed me. He told me that i was beautiful but i told him that i was poor and he immediately started dancing to a song that’s like “ r-r-r roll up to the party with my crazy pink wig, but i can’t fit through the door bc my as* is too big”??? 😔😢 I felt so scared and violated so i started crying. Then my grandma fell on the floor and dïed. He did have some sick moves though 💯
attributes.title: Rude 😭🤬
